tool_description: convert any file into a scalable, high-quality thumbnail image using a simple, straight-forward API
name: Thumbnail
title: Thumbnail

api_list.name: Thumbnail
api_list.description: Convert any file to convert it into a thumbnail image

required_parameters.name: file
required_parameters.description: The file you want to convert into a thumbnail image. For a full list of supported file types see https://www.thumbnailapi.com/documentation/#file-types

optional_parameters.name: height
optional_parameters.description: Specify a height of the thumbnail

optional_parameters.name: width
optional_parameters.description: Specify a width of the thumbnail
